alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:34PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Scotts Bluff, Kimball, Banner, Sioux, southeastern Niobrara, eastern Goshen and eastern Laramie Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 733 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Harrison to 10 miles east of South Greeley. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Agate Bed National Monument around 755 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Van Tassell, Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek, Melbeta, Henry and Bushnell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 374 and 402. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 1 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Kimball; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
